For the sake of the few who are loyal, whose happiness was exposed to the seditious influence of the rebellious members of his household, he 
                                                                           330
separates his undutiful children from his family, while at the same time he labors to bring the remaining faithful and loyal ones closer to himself. All would honor the wise and just course of such a parent, in punishing most severely his undutiful, rebellious children.
